titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of LaFreniere v. Congress of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/1/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel, in conjunction with counsel for the House of Representatives, to represent Congress in the case of LaFreniere v. Congress of the United States.
